name: Make Bugs Before Get Fired
description:
Make Bugs Before get fire

You are a programmer who covered a peer bug and now you know you will be fired. Your only idea before being fired is to enter the code of the company's projects and introduce errors.

How many bugs will you be able to add to the company's projects before I fire you?

GitHub repository URL:

https://github.com/FcoJLunaLuis/Make-Bugs-Before-Get-Fired
